title: Youngest Charleston, S.C., Shooting Victim 'Wanted To Make It'
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish visits the barbershop where 26-year-old Tywanza Sanders worked. She also spoke to a Washington, D.C., church leader who wants the government to do more to protect black churches.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
